import React from "react"; import "../../App.css"; import CardItem from "./CardItem"; function PizzaRecipeItem() { return ( <>

Ingredients:

{" "} 6 large eggs, whisked, 1 tablespoon butter or oil, for cooking

2 Udiâ€™s Gluten Free Pizza Crusts, 1 cup mozzarella cheese

4 slices Canadian ham

{" "}

Directions:

Preheat oven to 400F and remove gluten-free pizza crusts from packaging.

In a large, non-stick skillet, melt butter or oil and add whisked eggs.

Cook, lifting gently and stirring slightly to allow uncooked portions to flow underneath, 2-3 minutes until set but not overcooked

Remove from heat, set aside.

Add salt, mustard, vinegar and sugar and blend them well into the sauce

{" "} add the eggs individually to the sauce, cover the pan with a lid{" "}

reduce the heat and let the eggs gently simmer 8-10 mins

Switch off the stove and serve the eggs with fried or boiled potatoes garnished with some chives

); } export default PizzaRecipeItem;
